price: 36. Kamase aanu helin gudaheeda (magaaladaa) wax aan aheyn hal guri oo muslimiin ah4.
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: 4. Luud iyo reerkiisa marka laga reebo xaaskiisa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
